img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a player character is engaged in combat with a large creature resembling a boar or beast in a sandy environment. The creature is identified as the "First Prince of Flowing Sands" with a health bar displayed at the bottom of the screen. The player character is wielding a weapon and appears to be dodging or attacking the creature. Various icons and meters are visible on the screen, indicating gameplay elements such as health, abilities, or inventory. The scene is dynamic, with dust and debris being kicked up, suggesting movement and action.
